speaker: Male Speaker
narrator_cue: Suppose that you are introduced to someone, what would you say?

speaker: Male Speaker
narrator_cue: Tell the person to come right in.

speaker: Male Speaker
narrator_cue: Ask the person if he would like something to drink.

speaker: Male Speaker
narrator_cue: Ask the woman where her husband is.

speaker: Female Speaker
text: Je ne sais pas où il est.
narrator_cue: Say, "I don't know where he is."

speaker: Female Speaker
narrator_cue: Ask the man where his wife is.

speaker: Female Speaker
text: Est-ce que vous avez des enfants?
narrator_cue: Ask someone if he has children.

speaker: Male Speaker
narrator_cue: And now try to say we have children.

speaker: Female Speaker
narrator_cue: Do you remember how to say, "You would like"?

speaker: Male Speaker
narrator_cue: Tell me the boy is big.

speaker: Male Speaker
narrator_cue: Tell me the girl is big.

speaker: Female Speaker
text: Est-ce que le garçon est grand?
narrator_cue: Ask him if the boy is big.

speaker: Female Speaker
text: Est-ce que la fille est grande?
narrator_cue: Ask her if the girl is big.
